title: PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro Self-Cleaning Cat Litter Box – Electric, Hands-Free Self-Scooping with Disposable Crystal Trays, Odor Control, Includes Hood, Gray
description: Revolutionize your pet care routine with the PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro automatic self cleaning cat litter box. This automatic litter box eliminates the need for scooping, cleaning, or refilling for weeks, making it a must-have for every cat owner. Stand out from the crowd with unbeatable odor control provided by this automatic self cleaning litter box. The cat litter box automatic cleaning system effectively eliminates unpleasant smells, making this self-cleaning litter box a top choice for managing odors. Bid farewell to messy floors thanks to the top-entry hooded cover design that helps to capture litter from the cats paws while exiting the box. This cat litter box ensures a cleaner home and a more comfortable experience for your cat. The no scoop litterbox features a plastic lining to guard against leaks and keep your floors clean, making maintaining your cat's litter box a breeze. Keep an eye on your cat's health with the built-in health counter of the PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro Self-Cleaning Cat Litter Box. With U.S.-based customer care ready to help, this product is more than just a product - it's a comprehensive pet care solution.
